issue.title: [Packaging][RPM] Disable GCS for Amazon Linux 2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16935](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16935). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because it hits an RPM bug: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=304121

It was fixed in RPM 4.14.0 by https://github.com/rpm-software-management/rpm/commit/88989572fff1f31e0c4f972a6895585e4742ef4b but Amazon Linux 2 ships 4.11.3.

This is caused by the latest Google Cloud C++ SDK updated by ARROW-16510.
